name: REBATES_ITEM_405_04
description: Application for a Rebate Item 405.04 certificate. For goods donated to disabled persons or for the upliftment of indigent persons.

fields.tooltip: Enter Non Profit Organisation Name Eg Home for the Homeless
Enter Welfare Registration Number Eg BW00001234567

fields.description: Enter the plot number of the organisation
fields.tooltip: Enter Export Quanity Eg 2055
Enter Street/Ward of Organisation Eg Boratapula street
Select City/Town/Village of Organisation Eg Gabane
Enter Contact Number of Organisation Eg 72342055
Enter Contact Email of Organisation Eg example@gmail.com
Enter Facsimile Number of Organisation Eg  355 2055

fields.hint: eg. give specifications of the distibutors
fields.tooltip: Enter Details of distributors Eg give specifications of the distributors
Enter TIN/VAT registration No Eg BW00001234567
Select Port of entry Eg Pioneer Border Pose
fields.options: Ramokgwebana Border Post*Ramatlabama Border Post*Pioneer Border Post*Martins Drift Border Post*Tlokweng Border Post*Kazungula Ferry Border Post*Kazungula Road Border Post*Mamuno Border Post*Sir Seretse Khama International Airport*Maun International Airport*Kasane International Airport*PG Matante International Airport

fields.description: Select what the Donation is for
fields.tooltip: Select what the Donation is for  Eg Free Distribution
fields.options: Free distribution*Official use by the organisation

fields.fieldLabel: Detailed description of the distribution infrastructure
fields.description: Enter Detailed description of the distribution infrastructure
fields.tooltip: Enter Detailed descriptionof the distribution infrastructure Eg specification of the distribution infrastructure
Enter Storage Place Physical Address  Eg Metlhabeng-Tlokweng

fields.fieldLabel: Add a list of Imported Goods
fields.description: Add a list of Imported Goods

5.Column Name: Reference of Bill of Lading Document

fields.fieldLabel: Certificate of Registration with Registrar of Societies
fields.tooltip: Welfare organizations must provide Certificate of Registration with Registrar of Societies
A written undertaking or application letter by the Applicant
Bill of Lading/ Waybill/ Consignment Note
Copy of Registration Certificate as a non-profit organisation in terms of the Non-Profit Organizations Act (if applicable)
Letter from Donor confirming that the goods are donated  to disabled persons or for the upliftment of indigent persons (Gift Certificate)
Invoice
Copy of Statutory Agreement (if applicable)
The attached declaration must be completed by both the applicant and any other body responsible for distribution of donated goods.
Signed affidavit.

fields.description: Required if you have previously been issued with a certificate of this type
